11#ifndef VPX_VP8_DECODER_TREEREADER_H_
12#define VPX_VP8_DECODER_TREEREADER_H_
13
14#include "./vpx_config.h"
15#include "vp8/common/treecoder.h"
16#include "dboolhuff.h"
17
18#ifdef __cplusplus
19extern "C" {
20#endif
21
22typedef BOOL_DECODER vp8_reader;
23
24#define vp8_read vp8dx_decode_bool
25#define vp8_read_literal vp8_decode_value
26#define vp8_read_bit(R) vp8_read(R, vp8_prob_half)
27
28/* Intent of tree data structure is to make decoding trivial. */
29
30static INLINE int vp8_treed_read(
31 vp8_reader *const r, /* !!! must return a 0 or 1 !!! */
32 vp8_tree t, const vp8_prob *const p) {
33 vp8_tree_index i = 0;
34
35 while ((i = t[i + vp8_read(r, p[i >> 1])]) > 0) {
36 }
37
38 return -i;
39}
40
41#ifdef __cplusplus
42} // extern "C"
43#endif
44
45#endif // VPX_VP8_DECODER_TREEREADER_H_
46
